page.title: 07Events in Gwyddelwern
page.content: {Eisteddfod }This is held annually in November. Adults & children compete in singing, recitation, cookery, art, woodwork and crafts. Local residents only are eligable and it is conducted in Welsh. {Carnival}- This is held in July, each year a Guest is invited, who has past connections with the community, to crown the Carnival Queen and judge the fancy dress competitions. There are various side shows, and entertainments There is a seven-a-side football competition, Youths & Adults, Male & Female teams between neighbouring villages. Sports are provided for all age groups. {Show}- Held in August for local residents. There are various sections, Home Produce, Horticultural and Poultry. Cups and medals are competed for. Adults and children take part.
